name: CastleRTS
description:
Red and Blue kingdoms are back at war! They are mobilizing their troops to attack the other castle! Sending peasants, riders, knights, and archers!

Things to know: Archers shoot one shot per target. Good idea to bring at least two.  Knights take half damage from arrows, thus taking six to kill them.  Riders only deal one damage to castles, archers deal none.  Speed, lowest to highest: Knight, peasants, archers, then riders.  Health, Lowest to highest: peasant1, archer1, rider2, Knight3.

Time to show 'em a thing or two ey?!
